test_vote_endpoint_validation
=============================

.. py:module:: test_vote_endpoint_validation

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Test vote endpoint validations



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_vote_endpoint_validation.client


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_vote_endpoint_validation.setup_test_data
   test_vote_endpoint_validation.test_get_votes_for_existing_activity
   test_vote_endpoint_validation.test_get_votes_for_existing_activity_with_no_votes
   test_vote_endpoint_validation.test_get_votes_for_nonexistent_activity


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: setup_test_data()

   Set up test data before each test.


.. py:function:: test_get_votes_for_existing_activity()

   Test that querying votes for existing activity succeeds.


.. py:function:: test_get_votes_for_existing_activity_with_no_votes()

   Test querying an activity that exists but has no votes yet.


.. py:function:: test_get_votes_for_nonexistent_activity()

   Test that querying votes for non-existent activity returns 404.


.. py:data:: client
